description:
After this course, you will be able to write and publish your books in 24 hours to Amazon, Apple, Google, and many e-book retailers. You will be able to make passive income with only basic computer skills and internet skills.

The course shares with you valuable tips to:

- Find topics for e-book thatÂ is easy to write and easy to sell

- Write your content fast, clean, and accepted by publisher

- Create a great book cover

- Name your book with a thoughtful book title

- Make your books works well with search engine of retailers so that readers can find your e-books

- Select the right publisher who works with many retailers and charges low fee

- Promote your book to attract more readers

All 18 videos are created in clear slides and voice. It should take you less than 1 hour to complete.
title: Write and Publish ebook in 24 hours
